articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: Quentin Tarantino will sell 7 never-before-seen clips from 'Pulp Fiction' as NFTs - CNN
articles.description: Quentin Tarantino is getting into NFTs. The two-time Academy Award-winning director and screenwriter announced Tuesday that he will sell NFTs of seven original scenes from "Pulp Fiction," arguably his most famous film.
